skills.label: Customize Outlook settings
items: Include original messages with all reply messages, change text formats for all outgoing messages, customize the navigation pane, block specific addresses, configure views, manage multiple accounts, set outlook options

skills.label: Automate Outlook
items: Change quoted text colors, create and assign signatures, use quick steps, create and manage rules, create auto-replies

skills.label: Print and save information in Outlook
items: Print messages, print calendars, save message attachments, preview attachments, print contacts, print tasks, save messages in alternate formats, create data files

skills.label: Search in Outlook
items: Create new search folders, search for messages, search for tasks, search for contacts, search calendars, use advanced find, use search by location

skills.label: Create a message
items: Create messages, forward messages, delete messages, add/remove message attachments, add cc and bcc to messages, add voting options to messages, reply to all, reply to sender only, prioritize messages, mark as private, request delivery/read receipt, redirect replies, delegate access

skills.label: Format a message
items: Format text, insert hyperlinks, apply themes and styles, insert images, add a signature to specific messages, format signatures, create and use quick parts

skills.label: Organize and manage messages
items: Sort messages, move messages between folders, add new local folders, apply categories, configure junk email settings, clean up messages, mark as read/unread, flag messages, ignore messages, sort by conversation, set attachment reminder options

skills.label: Create and manage calendars
items: Adjust viewing details for calendars, modify calendar time zones, delete calendars, set calendar work times, use multiple calendars, manage calendar groups, overlay calendars, share calendars

skills.label: Create appointments, meetings, and events
items: Create calendar items, create recurring calendar items, cancel calendar items, create calendar items from messages, set calendar item times, categorize calendar items, use the scheduling assistant, change availability status, schedule resources, utilize room finder

skills.label: Organize and manage appointments, meetings, and events
items: Set calendar item importance, forward calendar items, configure reminders, add participants, respond to invitations, update calendar items, share meeting notes

skills.label: Create and manage notes, tasks, and journals
items: Create and manage tasks, create and manage notes, attach notes to contacts, create journal entries, update task status

skills.label: Create and manage contacts
items: Create new contacts, delete contacts, import contacts from external sources, edit contact information, attach an image to contacts, add tags to contacts, share contacts, manage multiple address books

skills.label: Create and manage groups
items: Create new contact groups, add contacts to existing groups, add notes to a group, update contacts within groups, delete groups, delete group members
